title: Clyde and Wanda: The Cedar Cove Chronicles, Book Two
description: Seven years have passed since Clyde Jansan's neice, Lilly Jean, was rescued from Horace Hammond's well. During that time, Clyde has married, has a daughter and is the owner of the store he always dreamed of. With Horace Hammond in prison and his sons Reuben and T.H. in the Army, there is nothing to worry about in Cedar Cove. Or is there?
author: Cynthia Ulmer
